sub_terms.b: the act of admitting paternity compare

2.definition: a thing done or given in recognition of something received [an came in the mail]

3 a.definition: a declaration or avowal of one's act or a fact to give it legal validitya declaration before a duly qualified public officer (as a notary public) by a person who has executed an instrument that the execution was the person's free act and deed

sub_terms.b: the formal certificate made by an officer before whom one has acknowledged a deed including as an essential part the signature and often the seal of the officer
